thread.title: Explore A River, Mountains, And Desert In One Day When You Visit This State Park In Arizona
thread.title_full: Explore A River, Mountains, And Desert In One Day When You Visit This State Park In Arizona

author: Melissa Mahoney
title: Explore A River, Mountains, And Desert In One Day When You Visit This State Park In Arizona
text:
Explore A River, Mountains, And Desert In One Day When You Visit This State Park In Arizona
With over 30
Arizona state parks, each with its own wonderful aspects and ways to enjoy the outdoors, there’s so much to explore! However, some parks offer a bit more than others. One of these parks is located along the Lower Colorado River in Parker, AZ. Spend a day at Buckskin Mountain State Park where you can explore mountains, a river, and the desert all in the same day.
Have you spent a day at Buckskin Mountain State Park in Parker, Arizona yet? To learn more about Buckskin Mountain State Park and to plan your visit, head to the
Arizona State Parks website.
If you plan on hiking at Buckskin Mountain or any other AZ state park, make sure to download the
AllTrails+ app to guide you. And check out the Ultimate Hiking Packing List for the essentials you’ll need on the trails.
[The Ultimate Hiking Packing List: 75 Must-Have Hiking Accessories]
